content: at the end of this first row 18 k5 mc k1 cc k2 mc k3 cc k1 round mc k1 cc k4 mc repeat to end of round row 2 knit in contrast color cc red row 19 k9 mc k1 cc k8 mc repeat to row 3 knit mc black end of round row 20 knit in main color mc colorwork hint when knitting the contrast row 21 knit in contrast color cc at the color and main color in the same row make end of this round you can cut your contrast sure the main color black yarn is always color red yarn with a ~5 inch ~13 cm tail held above and contrast red is always held for weaving in below so the contrast color red in this row 22-27 knit in main color or knit more case will be the dominant color i also use a rounds until your desired length if you want jacquard stitch to carry the long red floats a longer floppy hat starting in row 4 through row 21 i also use a jacquard stitch to carry my long black decreasing row floats in row 5-9 row 28 place stitch markers every 18 stitches *knit 18 place marker* repeat * to * row 4 k8 mc k3 cc k7 mc repeat to end to the end of the row of round row 29 *knit to two stitches before the next row 5 k6 mc k7 cc k5 mc repeat to end marker k2tog slip marker* repeat * to * to of round the end of the row row 6 k5 mc k9 cc k4 mc repeat to end row 30 and 31 knit to end of row of round row 32 and every even row *knit to two row 7 k4 mc k11 cc k3 mc repeat to stitches before the marker k2tog slip end of round marker* repeat * to * to the end of the row row 8 k3 mc k13 cc k2 mc repeat to row 33 and every odd row knit to end of end of round the row row 9 k3 mc k3 cc k2 mc k3 cc k2 continue until you have 7-14 stitches left on mc repeat to end of round your needles cut yarn with a ~6 inch tail row 10 k2 mc k3 cc k4 mc k1 cc k4 and sew the yarn through remaining stitches mc k3 cc k1 mc repeat to end of round on your needles to secure the top weave in row 11-14 k2 mc k2 cc k5 mc k1 cc the ends on the inside of your hat k5 mc k2 cc k1 mc repeat to end of round 2 starwarsrebelbeanie by heather u price chart 3
